code: @Test(expected = IllegalArgumentException.class) public void testCtorWithNullBeanFactory() throws Exception {     new DefaultScopedObject(null, GOOD_BEAN_NAME). }
@Test(expected = IllegalArgumentException.class) public void testCtorWithNullTargetBeanName() throws Exception {     testBadTargetBeanName(null). }
@Test(expected = IllegalArgumentException.class) public void testCtorWithEmptyTargetBeanName() throws Exception {     testBadTargetBeanName(""). }
@Test(expected = IllegalArgumentException.class) public void testCtorWithJustWhitespacedTargetBeanName() throws Exception {     testBadTargetBeanName("   "). }

private static void testBadTargetBeanName(final String badTargetBeanName) {     ConfigurableBeanFactory factory = mock(ConfigurableBeanFactory.class).     new DefaultScopedObject(factory, badTargetBeanName). }
